name: PermissionDynamicContextKey<T>
description: Represents a key that can be used to build a PermissionDynamicContext . Keys, along with their associated values, can be used to provide additional context for a permission handler in determining whether to grant permission for an actor and a specific node. As an example usage, a dimension context key could be used inside a building permission check to ensure that the actor can build given those constraints.

fields.name: typeToken
fields.description: The field for the typeToken record component.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The field for the name record component.

fields.name: serializer
fields.description: The field for the serializer record component.

constructors.name: PermissionDynamicContextKey
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a PermissionDynamicContextKey record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: typeToken
methods.description: Returns the value of the typeToken record component.

methods.name: name
methods.description: Returns the value of the name record component.

methods.name: serializer
methods.description: Returns the value of the serializer record component.
